title: How We Specify Document Type Of HTML5 Page ?

What Does the CSS Property 'display: none;' Do ?
answer_1: Hides an Element Without Reserving Space for It
answer_3: Creates a Border Around an Element
answer_4: Adds a Shadow to an Element
right_answer: Hides an Element Without Reserving Space for It

title: What is the Purpose of the CSS Property 'margin' ?
answer_1: To Change the Background Color of an Element
answer_2: To Add Space Outside an Element's Border
answer_3: To Change the Font Size of Text
right_answer: To Add Space Outside an Element's Border

title: What is the Box Model in CSS ?
answer_1: A Method for Creating Rounded Corners on Elements
answer_2: A Concept That Describes How Elements Are Rendered as Boxes
answer_3: A Technique for Centering Elements on a Page
answer_4: A Way to Add Shadows to Elements
right_answer: A Concept That Describes How Elements Are Rendered as Boxes

title: What is the Purpose of the CSS Property 'z-index' ?
answer_1: To Adjust the Opacity of an Element
answer_2: To Control the Vertical Stacking Order of Elements
answer_4: To Change the Width of an Element
right_answer: To Control the Vertical Stacking Order of Elements
